divs: sighting detailsbright light over berthoud 3 nights now. i took some pictures from the foothills looking southeast over berthoud. is this a bright star? there seems to be angles to it when you enlarge the pictures. if you look closely at some of the many pictures i have taken the past 3 nights, there appears to be blue dots that are aligned to form cubes\elongated cubes\circles etc. right behind the "star". i just would like to know if it is indeed a bright star. thanks so much.
